snippet.title: The Bureau: XCOM Declassified -- Call The Shots
snippet.description: The Bureau is a squad-based tactical shooter that challenges players to customize agents, create tactical game plans and execute them in real-time using an interface called "Battle Focus." As demonstrated in this video, the Battle Focus interface, combined with the player's own tactical thinking, makes it entirely possible to win engagements without the player ever firing a shot of their own.
